snippets.snippet: Get a taste for the Puerto Vallarta culinary scene during this comprehensive walking food tour led by a local guide who’ll share tales of the city’s history along the way. Ideal for first-time visitors and travelers tight on time, you’ll sample snacks and drinks from nine different carefully-selected spots that you might not otherwise have time to try individually.
